t: Psalm 136
Thanksgiving to God for His Enduring Mercy
Oh,*pn give thanks to the Lord,*s for He*i is*i good! For*ld His mercy endures*i forever.
Oh,*ld give thanks to the God of gods! For*ld His mercy endures*i forever.
Oh,*ld give thanks to the Lord of lords! For*ld His mercy endures*i forever:
To*ln Him who alone does great wonders, For*ld His mercy endures*i forever;
To*ld Him who by wisdom made the heavens, For*ld His mercy endures*i forever;
To*ld Him who laid out the earth above the waters, For*ld His mercy endures*i forever;
To*ld Him who made great lights, For*ld His mercy endures*i forever—
The*ld sun to rule by day, For*ld His mercy endures*i forever;
The*ld moon and stars to rule by night, For*ld His mercy endures*i forever.
To*ln Him who struck Egypt in their firstborn, For*ld His mercy endures*i forever;
And*ld brought out Israel from among them, For*ld His mercy endures*i forever;
With*ld a strong hand, and with an outstretched arm, For*ld His mercy endures*i forever;
To*ld Him who divided the Red Sea in two, For*ld His mercy endures*i forever;
And*ld made Israel pass through the midst of it, For*ln His mercy endures*i forever;
But*ld overthrew Pharaoh and his army in the Red Sea, For*ld His mercy endures*i forever;
To*ld Him who led His people through the wilderness, For*ld His mercy endures*i forever;
To*ld Him who struck down great kings, For*ld His mercy endures*i forever;
And*ld slew famous kings, For*ld His mercy endures*i forever—
Sihon*ld king of the Amorites, For*ld His mercy endures*i forever;
And*ld Og king of Bashan, For*ld His mercy endures*i forever—
And*ld gave their land as a heritage, For*ld His mercy endures*i forever;
A*ld heritage to Israel His servant, For*ld His mercy endures*i forever.
Who*ln remembered us in our lowly state, For*ld His mercy endures*i forever;
And*ld rescued us from our enemies, For*ld His mercy endures*i forever;
Who*ld gives food to all flesh, For*ld His mercy endures*i forever.
Oh,*ln give thanks to the God of heaven! For*ld His mercy endures*i forever.
